018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.cli;
019
020import java.io.File;
021import java.io.IOException;
022import java.io.InputStream;
023import java.nio.file.Files;
024import java.nio.file.Path;
025import java.util.Arrays;
026import java.util.Comparator;
027import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
031import java.util.logging.LogManager;
032import java.util.stream.Collectors;
033import java.util.stream.Stream;
034
035import picocli.CommandLine;
036import picocli.CommandLine.Command;
037import picocli.CommandLine.Option;
038
039/**
040 * Main command-line interface for actor-IaC.
041 *
042 * <p>This is the entry point for all actor-IaC commands. Use subcommands to
043 * execute specific operations:</p>
044 *
045 * <h2>Subcommands</h2>
046 * <ul>
047 *   <li>{@code run} - Execute workflows</li>
048 *   <li>{@code list} - List available workflows</li>
049 *   <li>{@code describe} - Describe workflow structure</li>
050 *   <li>{@code logs} - Query execution logs</li>
051 *   <li>{@code log-server} - Start H2 log server</li>
052 *   <li>{@code db-clear} - Clear (delete) the log database</li>
053 * </ul>
054 *
055 * <h2>Usage Examples</h2>
056 * <pre>
057 * actor-iac run -d ./workflows -w deploy
058 * actor-iac list -d ./workflows
059 * actor-iac logs --db ./logs --list
060 * actor-iac log-server --db ./logs
061 * </pre>
062 *
063 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
064 * @since 2.7.0
065 */
066@Command(
067    name = "actor-iac",
068    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
069    version = "actor-IaC 2.12.0",
070    description = "Infrastructure as Code workflow automation tool.",
071    subcommands = {
072        RunCLI.class,
073        ListWorkflowsCLI.class,
074        DescribeCLI.class,
075        LogsCLI.class,
076        LogServerCLI.class,
077        MergeLogsCLI.class,
078        DbClearCLI.class
079    }
080)
081public class WorkflowCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
082
083    /**
084     * Main entry point.
085     *
086     * @param args command line arguments
087     */
088    public static void main(String[] args) {
089        // Load logging configuration from resources
090        try (InputStream is = WorkflowCLI.class.getResourceAsStream("/logging.properties")) {
091            if (is != null) {
092                LogManager.getLogManager().readConfiguration(is);
093            }
094        } catch (IOException e) {
095            System.err.println("Warning: Failed to load logging.properties: " + e.getMessage());
096        }
097
098        int exitCode = new CommandLine(new WorkflowCLI()).execute(args);
099        System.exit(exitCode);
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * Called when no subcommand is specified.
104     * Shows help message.
105     */
106    @Override
107    public Integer call() {
108        System.out.println("actor-IaC - Infrastructure as Code workflow automation tool");
109        System.out.println();
110        System.out.println("Usage: actor-iac <command> [options]");
111        System.out.println();
112        System.out.println("Commands:");
113        System.out.println("  run          Execute a workflow");
114        System.out.println("  list         List available workflows");
115        System.out.println("  describe     Describe workflow structure");
116        System.out.println("  log-search   Search execution logs");
117        System.out.println("  log-serve    Start H2 log server for centralized logging");
118        System.out.println("  log-merge    Merge scattered log databases into one");
119        System.out.println();
120        System.out.println("Examples:");
121        System.out.println("  actor-iac run -d ./workflows -w deploy");
122        System.out.println("  actor-iac run -d ./workflows -w deploy -i inventory.ini -g webservers");
123        System.out.println("  actor-iac list -d ./workflows");
124        System.out.println("  actor-iac log-search --db ./logs --list");
125        System.out.println("  actor-iac log-serve --db ./logs/shared");
126        System.out.println("  actor-iac log-merge --scan ./workflows --target ./logs/merged");
127        System.out.println();
128        System.out.println("Use 'actor-iac <command> --help' for more information about a command.");
129        return 0;
130    }
131}
132
133/**
134 * Subcommand to list workflows discovered under a directory.
135 */
136@Command(
137    name = "list",
138    mixinStandardHelpOptions = true,
139    version = "actor-IaC list 2.12.0",
140    description = "List workflows discovered under --dir."
141)
142class ListWorkflowsCLI implements Callable<Integer> {
143
144    @Option(
145        names = {"-d", "--dir"},
146        required = true,
147        description = "Directory containing workflow files (searched recursively)"
148    )
149    private File workflowDir;
150
151    @Override
152    public Integer call() {
153        if (!workflowDir.isDirectory()) {
154            System.err.println("Not a directory: " + workflowDir);
155            return 1;
156        }
157
158        List<WorkflowDisplay> displays = scanWorkflowsForDisplay(workflowDir);
159        if (displays.isEmpty()) {
160            System.out.println("No workflow files found under " + workflowDir.getAbsolutePath());
161            return 0;
162        }
163
164        System.out.println("Available workflows (directory: " + workflowDir.getAbsolutePath() + ")");
165        System.out.println("-".repeat(90));
166        System.out.printf("%-4s %-25s %-35s %s%n", "#", "File (-w)", "Path", "Workflow Name (in logs)");
167        System.out.println("-".repeat(90));
168        int index = 1;
169        for (WorkflowDisplay display : displays) {
170            String workflowName = display.workflowName() != null ? display.workflowName() : "(no name)";
171            System.out.printf("%2d.  %-25s %-35s %s%n",
172                index++, display.baseName(), display.relativePath(), workflowName);
173        }
174        System.out.println("-".repeat(90));
175        System.out.println("Use 'actor-iac run -d " + workflowDir + " -w <File>' to execute a workflow.");
176        return 0;
177    }
178
179    private static List<WorkflowDisplay> scanWorkflowsForDisplay(File directory) {
180        if (directory == null) {
181            return List.of();
182        }
183
184        try (Stream<Path> paths = Files.walk(directory.toPath())) {
185            Map<String, File> uniqueFiles = new LinkedHashMap<>();
186            paths.filter(Files::isRegularFile)
187                 .filter(path -> {
188                     String name = path.getFileName().toString().toLowerCase();
189                     return name.endsWith(".yaml") || name.endsWith(".yml")
190                         || name.endsWith(".json") || name.endsWith(".xml");
191                 })
192                 .forEach(path -> uniqueFiles.putIfAbsent(path.toFile().getAbsolutePath(), path.toFile()));
193
194            Path basePath = directory.toPath();
195            return uniqueFiles.values().stream()
196                .map(file -> new WorkflowDisplay(
197                    getBaseName(file.getName()),
198                    relativize(basePath, file.toPath()),
199                    extractWorkflowName(file)))
200                .sorted(Comparator.comparing(WorkflowDisplay::baseName, String.CASE_INSENSITIVE_ORDER))
201                .collect(Collectors.toList());
202        } catch (IOException e) {
203            System.err.println("Failed to scan workflows: " + e.getMessage());
204            return List.of();
205        }
206    }
207
208    private static String getBaseName(String fileName) {
209        int dotIndex = fileName.lastIndexOf('.');
210        if (dotIndex > 0) {
211            return fileName.substring(0, dotIndex);
212        }
213        return fileName;
214    }
215
216    private static String relativize(Path base, Path target) {
217        try {
218            return base.relativize(target).toString();
219        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
220            return target.toAbsolutePath().toString();
221        }
222    }
223
224    private static String extractWorkflowName(File file) {
225        String fileName = file.getName().toLowerCase();
226        if (fileName.endsWith(".yaml") || fileName.endsWith(".yml")) {
227            return extractNameFromYaml(file);
228        } else if (fileName.endsWith(".json")) {
229            return extractNameFromJson(file);
230        }
231        return null;
232    }
233
234    private static String extractNameFromYaml(File file) {
235        try (java.io.BufferedReader reader = new java.io.BufferedReader(new java.io.FileReader(file))) {
236            String line;
237            while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null) {
238                line = line.trim();
239                if (line.startsWith("name:")) {
240                    String value = line.substring(5).trim();
241                    if ((value.startsWith("\"") && value.endsWith("\"")) ||
242                        (value.startsWith("'") && value.endsWith("'"))) {
243                        value = value.substring(1, value.length() - 1);
244                    }
245                    return value.isEmpty() ? null : value;
246                }
247                if (line.startsWith("steps:") || line.startsWith("vertices:")) {
248                    break;
249                }
250            }
251        } catch (IOException e) {
252            // Ignore
253        }
254        return null;
255    }
256
257    private static String extractNameFromJson(File file) {
258        try (java.io.FileReader reader = new java.io.FileReader(file)) {
259            org.json.JSONTokener tokener = new org.json.JSONTokener(reader);
260            org.json.JSONObject json = new org.json.JSONObject(tokener);
261            return json.optString("name", null);
262        } catch (Exception e) {
263            // Ignore
264        }
265        return null;
266    }
267
268    private static record WorkflowDisplay(String baseName, String relativePath, String workflowName) {}
269}
